query.prompt: Create a word table. Taïde è, la puttana che rispuose al drudo suo quando disse “Ho io grazie grandi apo te?”: “Anzi maravigliose!”.
Create a word table. E quinci sian le nostre viste sazie».

| Word | Lemma | Part of Speech | Gender | Number | Person | Tense | Mood | Note | |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| | E | e | conj. | | | | | | | | quinci | quindi | adv. | | | | | | | | sian | essere | v. | | pl. | 3rd | present | subjunctive | | | le | lo | art. | f. | pl. | | | | | | nostre | nostro | adj. | f. | pl. | | | | | | viste | vista | n. | f. | pl. | | | | | | sazie | sazio | adj. | f. | pl. | | | | |
Note:
* "quinci" is an archaic form of "quindi". * "sian" is the present subjunctive form of the verb "essere" (to be). * "le" is the feminine plural form of the definite article "lo". * "nostre" is the feminine plural form of the possessive adjective "nostro". * "viste" is the feminine plural form of the noun "vista" (sight). * "sazie" is the feminine plural form of the adjective "sazio" (sated).
